mapper.select: SELECT res.subj_group as subjGroup,res.subject_no as subjectNo, res.subj_name as subjName,res.grade,res.subj_score as subjScore FROM students s, (SELECT student_id,subj_group, s.subject_no,subj_name,subj_score, r.grade,reg_year, reg_semester FROM registers r, subjects s, departmentes dep WHERE r.subject_no = s.subject_no AND dep.department_no = s.department_no) res WHERE s.student_id = res.student_id AND res.reg_year = #{regYear} AND res.reg_semester = #{regSemester} AND s.student_id= #{studentId}

SELECT res.reg_year as regYear, res.reg_semester as regSemester, res.subj_group as subjGroup, res.subj_name as subjName, res.grade as grade, res.subj_score as subjScore FROM students s, (SELECT student_id,subj_group, s.subject_no,subj_name,subj_score, r.grade,reg_year, reg_semester FROM registers r, subjects s, departmentes dep WHERE r.subject_no = s.subject_no AND dep.department_no = s.department_no) res WHERE s.student_id = res.student_id AND s.student_id= #{studentId} ORDER BY regYear, regSemester
SELECT DISTINCT reg_year as regYear, reg_semester as regSemester FROM registers WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY regYear, regSemester
